special_start.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                SPECIAL_START
00004 !
00005 !  Initialise set of particles for special test configs
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine special_start(iconf)
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012   use treevars
00013   use utils
00014   implicit none
00015 
00016   integer, intent(in) :: iconf
00017   integer :: i,iseed
00018   real :: rs,v0,gamma0,vt,xt,yt,zt,thetvel,phivel
00019   real :: dpx, vx_beam, vy_beam, vz_beam, st, ct, sp, cp, volb
00020   integer :: npb, p
00021   real :: gamma, Ndebye
00022 
00023   iseed = -17-me
00024 
00025   ! Define default container parameters in absence of plasma target
00026   Vplas = x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma
00027   Aplas = x_plasma * y_plasma
00028   focus = (/ xl/4., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of laser focal spot
00029   plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of plasma
00030   Qplas = ne
00031 
00032   config: select case(iconf)
00033 
00034   case(1)        ! electron disc at x=0 with 2pi phase spread
00035      qe=-1.0
00036      mass_e=1.0
00037      qi=1.0
00038      mass_i=mass_ratio
00039 
00040      r_beam=sigma/2.
00041      gamma0=sqrt(1+vosc**2/2.)
00042 
00043      do while (i < nep)
00044         yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00045 
00046         zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00047         if (yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00048            i = i+1
00049            x(i) = 2*pi*rano(iseed)
00050            y(i) = yt + focus(2)
00051            z(i) = zt + focus(3)
00052            ux(i) = 0.
00053            uy(i) = 0.
00054            uz(i) = 0.
00055 
00056         endif
00057      end do
00058      q(1:nep) = qe           ! plasma electrons
00059      m(1:nep) = mass_e            ! electron mass
00060 
00061   case(2)        ! electron disc at laser focus with 2pi phase spread
00062 
00063      qe=-1.0
00064      mass_e=1.0
00065      qi=1.0
00066      mass_i=mass_ratio
00067 
00068      r_beam=sigma/2.
00069      gamma0=sqrt(1+vosc**2/2.)
00070 
00071 
00072      x_crit = focus(1)
00073      do while (i < nep)
00074         yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00075 
00076         zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00077         if (yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00078            i = i+1
00079            x(i) = focus(1)
00080            y(i) = yt + focus(2)
00081            z(i) = zt + focus(3)
00082            ux(i) = 0.
00083            uy(i) = 0.
00084            uz(i) = 0.
00085 
00086         endif
00087      end do
00088      q(1:nep) = qe           ! plasma electrons
00089      m(1:nep) = mass_e            ! electron mass
00090 
00091 
00092   case(3)       ! random placement in box with vte in x,y plane for B test 
00093 
00094      qe=-1.0
00095      mass_e=1.0
00096      qi=1.0
00097      mass_i=mass_ratio
00098 
00099      do i=1,npp
00100         if (i<=nep) then
00101            vt=vte
00102            q(i) = qe        ! plasma electrons
00103            m(i) = mass_e 
00104         else
00105            vt = vti
00106            q(i) = qi        ! plasma ions (need Z* here)
00107            m(i) = mass_i    ! ion mass
00108 
00109         endif
00110         xt =  xl * rano(iseed) 
00111         yt =  yl * rano(iseed)
00112 !        zt =  zl * rano(iseed)
00113         zt = zl/2.-z_plasma/2.+z_plasma*i/1./npp
00114         x(i) = xt
00115         y(i) = yt
00116         z(i) = zt
00117         rs = rano(iseed)
00118         v0 = vt*sqrt(-2.0*log(rs))
00119         thetvel = 2*pi*rano(iseed)
00120         phivel = pi*rano(iseed)
00121         ux(i) = v0*cos(thetvel)
00122         uy(i) = v0*sin(thetvel)
00123 !        uz(i) = v0/10.
00124         uz(i) = v0*cos(phivel)
00125      end do
00126 
00127   case(4)      !  Special config for FMM comparison
00128      open(30,file='fmm_config.data')
00129      do i=1,npp
00130         read(30,*) x(i), y(i), z(i), q(i)
00131         m(i) = 1.
00132         ux(i)=0.
00133         uy(i)=0.
00134         uz(i)=0.
00135      end do
00136      force_const=1.
00137      dt=0.
00138      eps=0.
00139      close(30)
00140 
00141   case(5)     ! beam initialised along x-axis and rotated by theta, phi
00142 
00143 
00144      write (*,*) 'Preparing particle beam'
00145      npb = max(ni,ne)  ! Take whichever species switched on
00146      np_beam=0 ! Discard normal beam mode (plasma+beam)
00147      npp = max(nep,nip)
00148 
00149      ct = cos(theta_beam)
00150      st = sin(theta_beam)
00151      cp = cos(phi_beam)
00152      sp = sin(phi_beam)
00153      vz_beam = u_beam*st
00154      vx_beam = u_beam*ct*cp
00155      vy_beam = u_beam*ct*sp
00156      Volb = pi*r_beam**2*x_beam
00157      qe = Volb*rho_beam/npb    ! charge
00158      mass_e = mass_beam
00159      mass_i = mass_beam
00160      qi=-qe
00161      dpx=x_beam/npb           ! x-axis spacing
00162      i=0
00163      do while (i < npp)
00164         yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00165         zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00166 
00167         if (yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00168            i = i+1
00169            x(i)= start_beam + x_beam*rano(iseed)
00170            y(i) = yt + focus(2)
00171            z(i) = zt + focus(3)
00172            ux(i) = vx_beam
00173            uy(i) = vy_beam
00174            uz(i) = vz_beam
00175 
00176         endif
00177      end do
00178      q(1:npp) = qe           ! plasma electrons
00179      m(1:npp) = abs(qe*mass_beam)  ! electron mass
00180 
00181      !     write (*,'(a30/(5f13.5))') 'Beam config:', &
00182      !          (x(i),y(i),z(i),q(i),m(i),i=1,npp)
00183 
00184 
00185   case(6)       ! random placement in box xl*xl*xl for periodic system 
00186 
00187      ! Use Debye units 
00188      ! - lengths normalized to lambda_De
00189      ! - velocities to v_te
00190      ! - time to wpe^-1
00191      ! Effective density adjusted via box length
00192      ! TODO:   gamma, Ndebye need to be made global (physvars.f90)
00193 
00194      yl=xl
00195      zl=xl
00196      qe=-1.0
00197      mass_e=1.0
00198      qi=1.0
00199      mass_i=mass_ratio
00200      !  Inter-electron spacing
00201      a_ee = xl/(4*pi/3.*ne)**(1./3.)
00202      !  Inter-ion spacing
00203      a_ii = a_ee*Zion**(1./3.) 
00204 
00205      !  Renormalise softening parameter
00206      eps = eps * a_ee
00207 
00208      !  Equivalent Gamma
00209      gamma= a_ee**2/3.
00210      !  # electrons in Debye sphere
00211      Ndebye = (3*gamma)**(-1.5)
00212      !  Adjust force constant
00213      force_const = 1./3./Ndebye
00214 
00215      write (*,*) "Ewald Setup:"
00216      write (*,'(5(a30,f15.5/))') "Particle spacing ",a_ee, &
00217           "Softening parameter:",eps, &
00218           "Gamma:",gamma, &
00219           "# electrons in Debye sphere:",Ndebye, &
00220           "force const:",force_const
00221 
00222      do i=1,npp
00223         if (i<=nep) then
00224            q(i) = qe        ! plasma electrons
00225            m(i) = mass_e 
00226         else
00227            q(i) = qi        ! plasma ions (need Z* here)
00228            m(i) = mass_i    ! ion mass
00229 
00230         endif
00231         xt =  xl * rano(iseed) 
00232         yt =  xl * rano(iseed)
00233         zt =  xl * rano(iseed)
00234         x(i) = xt
00235         y(i) = yt
00236         z(i) = zt
00237      end do
00238 
00239 
00240      ! Setup 3v Maxwellian electrons
00241      ! TODO: max random seed processor-dependent
00242 
00243      call maxwell1(ux,nppm,1,nep,vte)
00244      call maxwell1(uy,nppm,1,nep,vte)
00245      call maxwell1(uz,nppm,1,nep,vte)
00246      call scramble_v(1,nep)   ! remove x,y,z correlations
00247      ! Ions cold    
00248      call cold_start(nep+1,nip)
00249 
00250 
00251   end select config
00252 
00253   ex(1:npp) = 0.
00254   ey(1:npp) = 0.
00255   ez(1:npp) = 0.
00256   bx(1:npp) = 0.
00257   by(1:npp) = 0.
00258   bz(1:npp) = 0.
00259   ax(1:npp) = 0.
00260   ay(1:npp) = 0.
00261   az(1:npp) = 0.
00262   axo(1:npp) = 0.
00263   ayo(1:npp) = 0.
00264   azo(1:npp) = 0.
00265   pot(1:npp) = 0.
00266 
00267 
00268   pelabel(1:nep)       = me * nep + (/(i, i = 1, nep)/)      ! Electron labels
00269   pelabel(nep + 1:npp) = ne + me * nip + (/(i, i = 1, nip)/) ! Ion labels
00270   pepid(1:npp) = me                ! processor ID
00271   work(1:npp) = 1.
00272   call push_full3v(1,npp,dt/2.)
00273 
00274 end subroutine special_start
